results.title: Effects of different antihypertensive treatments on morphologic progression of diabetic nephropathy in uninephrectomized dogs.
results.text_hl: @SPECIES_9615 @@@Dogs@@@ were prospectively randomized to one of five groups (N = 26): nondiabetic controls, Group I; @SPECIES_9615 @@@dogs@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Myotonic_Dystrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009223 @@@DM@@@ on no antihypertensive drugs, Group II; @SPECIES_9615 @@@dogs@@@ on a converting enzyme inhibitor, @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Leucine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007930 @@@L@@@), Group III; @SPECIES_9615 @@@dogs@@@ on a calcium antagonist, @CHEMICAL_clentiazem @CHEMICAL_MESH:C056595 @@@TA3090@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Diltiazem @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004110 @@@diltiazem@@@-like), Group IV; and @SPECIES_9615 @@@dogs@@@ on a combination of each drug, in reduced doses, Group V.

citations.NLM: Gaber L, Walton C, Brown S, Bakris G. Effects of different antihypertensive treatments on morphologic progression of diabetic nephropathy in uninephrectomized dogs. Kidney Int. 1994 Jul;46(1):161-9. PMID: 7933834
